entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are the family that Harry lives with. They are mentioned as having given Harry a pair of Uncle Vernon's old socks.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is one of the Dursleys and is mentioned as getting heavily to his feet to leave for the station.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is another member of the Dursley family and is mentioned as smoothing Dudley's hair and buying him a new bow tie.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Petunia's son and is mentioned as having his attention returned to the television after Uncle Vernon finished threatening Harry.
